MaxMind Geolocation DXL Service

This distribution contains following directories:

  • doc
    • MaxMind Geolocation DXL Service documentation
  • lib
    • MaxMind Geolocation DXL Service libraries (.zip, .egg, .whl)
  • sample
    • Samples that demonstrate using MaxMind Geolocation Service

Click here to view the documentation which includes installation instructions and usage examples.
